allow:
Bash(#!/bin/bash

# 生成随机session hash
SESSION_HASH=$(openssl rand -hex 6)

echo ""使用 session_hash: $SESSION_HASH""

# 提交任务
echo ""正在提交音乐生成任务...""
RESPONSE=$(curl -s -X POST ""https://aslp-lab-diffrhythm.hf.space/gradio_api/queue/join?"" \
  -H ""Content-Type: application/json"" \
  -d ""{
    \""data\"": [
      \""[00:04.34]Tell me that I''m special\\n[00:06.57]Tell me I look pretty\\n[00:08.46]Tell me I''m a little angel\"",
      {
        \""path\"": \""/tmp/gradio/60d28685e634b5f5d44ba7662290f050e17772d4e6e68700c2c2c6846d33448b/default.wav\"",
        \""url\"": \""https://github.com/gradio-app/gradio/raw/main/test/test_files/audio_sample.wav\"",
        \""orig_name\"": \""default.wav\"",
        \""meta\"": {\""_type\"": \""gradio.FileData\""}
      },
      \""\"",
      0,
      true,
      32,
      4,
      \""mp3\"",
      \""euler\"",
      \""quality first\"",
      false,
      null
    ],
    \""event_data\"": null,
    \""fn_index\"": 3,
    \""session_hash\"": \""$SESSION_HASH\""
  }"")

echo ""提交响应: $RESPONSE"")

Bash(# 使用之前的session_hash获取结果
SESSION_HASH=""087d4d65a55d""

echo ""正在获取生成结果...""
curl -s -X GET ""https://aslp-lab-diffrhythm.hf.space/gradio_api/queue/data?session_hash=$SESSION_HASH"" \
  -H ""Accept: text/event-stream"" \
  -H ""Cache-Control: no-cache"" | head -20)

Bash(# 生成新的session hash
SESSION_HASH=$(openssl rand -hex 6)
echo ""使用 session_hash: $SESSION_HASH""

# 先获取API信息来确认正确的端点
echo ""获取API信息...""
curl -s ""https://aslp-lab-diffrhythm.hf.space/gradio_api/info"" | jq ''.named_endpoints | keys'')

Bash(# 使用正确的音乐生成端点
SESSION_HASH=""61d75bbdf5ba""

echo ""正在提交到 /infer_music 端点...""
RESPONSE=$(curl -s -X POST ""https://aslp-lab-diffrhythm.hf.space/gradio_api/queue/join?"" \
  -H ""Content-Type: application/json"" \
  -d ""{
    \""data\"": [
      \""[00:04.34]Tell me that I''m special\\n[00:06.57]Tell me I look pretty\\n[00:08.46]Tell me I''m a little angel\\n[00:10.58]Sweetheart of your city\"",
      {
        \""path\"": \""/tmp/gradio/60d28685e634b5f5d44ba7662290f050e17772d4e6e68700c2c2c6846d33448b/default.wav\"",
        \""url\"": \""https://github.com/gradio-app/gradio/raw/main/test/test_files/audio_sample.wav\"",
        \""orig_name\"": \""default.wav\"",
        \""meta\"": {\""_type\"": \""gradio.FileData\""}
      },
      \""\"",
      0,
      true,
      32,
      4,
      \""mp3\"",
      \""euler\"",
      \""quality first\"",
      false,
      null
    ],
    \""event_data\"": null,
    \""fn_index\"": 4,
    \""session_hash\"": \""$SESSION_HASH\""
  }"")

echo ""提交响应: $RESPONSE"")

Bash(#!/bin/bash

# 生成新的session hash
SESSION_HASH=$(openssl rand -hex 6)
echo ""使用 session_hash: $SESSION_HASH""

# 提交任务
echo ""正在提交音乐生成任务...""
RESPONSE=$(curl -s -X POST ""https://aslp-lab-diffrhythm.hf.space/gradio_api/queue/join?"" \
  -H ""Content-Type: application/json"" \
  -d ""{
    \""data\"": [
      \""[00:04.34]Tell me that I''m special\\n[00:06.57]Tell me I look pretty\\n[00:08.46]Tell me I''m a little angel\"",
      {
        \""path\"": \""/tmp/gradio/60d28685e634b5f5d44ba7662290f050e17772d4e6e68700c2c2c6846d33448b/default.wav\"",
        \""url\"": \""https://github.com/gradio-app/gradio/raw/main/test/test_files/audio_sample.wav\"",
        \""orig_name\"": \""default.wav\"",
        \""meta\"": {\""_type\"": \""gradio.FileData\""}
      },
      \""\"",
      0,
      true,
      32,
      4,
      \""mp3\"",
      \""euler\"",
      \""quality first\"",
      false,
      null
    ],
    \""event_data\"": null,
    \""fn_index\"": 4,
    \""session_hash\"": \""$SESSION_HASH\""
  }"")

echo ""提交响应: $RESPONSE""

# 短时间获取结果状态（避免卡住）
echo ""获取初始状态...""
timeout 5 curl -s -X GET ""https://aslp-lab-diffrhythm.hf.space/gradio_api/queue/data?session_hash=$SESSION_HASH"" \
  -H ""Accept: text/event-stream"" | head -5

echo """"
echo ""任务已提交，session_hash为: $SESSION_HASH""
echo ""你可以使用以下命令持续检查状态：""
echo ""curl -s \""https://aslp-lab-diffrhythm.hf.space/gradio_api/queue/data?session_hash=$SESSION_HASH\"" -H \""Accept: text/event-stream\"" | head -10"")
